alert.note: Alert for Newton; Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 8:20PM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Louisiana... Sabine River Near Deweyville For the Sabine River...including Deweyville...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday evening at 830 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sabine River near Deweyville. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Thursday the stage was 21.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Sunday afternoon and continue rising to 24.5 feet Tuesday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Sabine River Deweyville 24.0 21.1 Thu 7 pm CST 22.6 23.5 24.1 &&
